name: STOREFRONT
description:
The Creator of this Game is now a part of Solid Spark 

STOREFRONT is a game where you play as a Security Guard in a shopping mall, your main goal is to give thieves beat downs for stealing as it gets progressively harder.

Why did I stop development?

Again similar to B.E.A.R, I felt the concept was good for a mini-game but the assets were not mine. They have been used in many other games and it removed some of the face value personally. I didn't want to make the game public as I was concerned with feedback and when I finally did I had great feedback but quite a lot of messages regarding the game as an "asset flip". I decided to stop development once I had a playable prototype up and running.
